subject: Fwd: Website feedback - new batch

full_threads.body:
@heath done on this updates heath, these are the remaining task
  • Update header image (pixelated). We will supply new image.
  • Update quality of images - these look pixelated. I will supply new images.
  • & Forms

You can check docs that I've shared to check what's done, Please check and let me know if we have any changes. Thanks 😉

action.text: Heath Maguire changed the customer to Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt
Heath Maguire assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
‌
@jaime here is another batch of changes for Acoufelt please.

Heath Maguire
Creative Director
Phone: 1300 072 134
‌
Wolf IQ
Level 2, 383 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000
wolfiq.com.au


ID0EC
Begin forwarded message:
From: Lucy Pittman | Acoufelt <lucy.pittman@acoufelt.com>
Subject: Website feedback
Date: 11 January 2022 at 4:52:43 pm AEDT
To: Heath <heath@wolfiq.com.au>

Hey Heath,

Hope you had a lovely break! Just to clarify some items discussed on our call today can you please action the following:

MENU NAV:

Change to 'WoodBeQuiet™ Planks'

After CEILING, Change these to 'Ceiling Panels' and 'Ceiling Tiles'

Under 'Ceiling Panels' and 'Ceiling Tiles', change to just 'Full Color' and 'Printed'

Under 'Sound advice' Change from 'VIDEO MINI-SERIES' to 'ADVISORY BOARD MINI-SERIES' and add details incl:

ADVISORY BOARD MINI-SERIES (VIDEO)

SOUND GLOSSARY (BLOG)

NRC DEMYSFITFIED (BLOG)

Can we recombine 'featured projects' and 'snapshot projects' onto just one 'PROJECT' page:

Search function:

Fix height

SOUND ADVICE

https://au.acoufelt.com/sound-advice/video-mini-series/

Change format to LHS and RHS paras to follow format of other pages.

Check order of videos on this page (have episode 1 be displayed first, then episode 2,3 etc) - FYI title is 'EPISODE 1 - CONSIDERATIONS FOR A POSITIVE INTERACTIVE SPACE'

With description:

In episode 1, our Global Advisory Board members were asked 'What considerations should architects and designers factor into their plans to ensure human interaction with a space is positive?'. Advisory Board Chair Michael Neale says "everybody's experiences have changed radically as a result of COVID. People have started to do things differently because they were forced to. The biggest thing that we've discovered is that our workspaces, our living spaces and our learning spaces all need to be flexible…". ​

Remove 'watch the full video above' button - not necessary.

PRODUCT PAGES:

Hotspots are self explanatory in most cases for product pages.

Full Color Ceiling Panels - Acoufelt Australia

Check ceiling panels page format - to match the full color wall panels page format. (Full Color Panel - Acoufelt Australia )

Exclude 24mm and change copy on RHS to:

FilaSorb™ 12 & 24 come in all full colors, and has a continuous solid color rigid core for versatility in design and cutting applications.

FilaSorb™ 25 is made from a low GSM, soft PET core with rigid top and bottom skins, making it perfect for ceiling installations due to its lightweight construction.

FilaSorb™ 30 is constructed using a low GSM, soft vertical fiber core, providing structural stability and installation versatility. A full color skin can also be added to the facing of the panel to provide endless design options. The innovation of Acoufelt's Echostrut installation framework is recommended for high ceiling applications that require longevity and structural stability, ideal for settings like aquatic centres, gymnasiums and convention centres.

And have all colorways displayed/open when clicked.

ABOUT US

About us page (change 'making quiet by design' to.. 'Making Quiet for the ears and eyes' or 'What it means to be 'Making Quiet')

Switch the black box here? Or change the background colour of pages to section this out a little better.

Missing [READ MORE] button that goes to the 'design and manufacturing' page.

Add button here [VIEW PROJECTS] to go to the Projects page.

Link here to [OUR CULTURE] that goes to the Culture page.

CULTURE:

https://acoufelt.com/au/our-team-and-culture/

Culture page very internal facing - can we please move to the footer, or link under/near the 'Join our team' section on the Contact Us page.

CONTACT US:

Delete Lorem Ipsum text.

Change from 'Contact us' to 'Tell us about yourself'

OUR BRANDS:

Our Brands - Acoufelt Australia

Links not working to any brands images

Update QuietLight image.

QuietBack™ - Acoufelt Australia - check icons. Please add TM's to all QuietBack references. Formatting of lines on page.

FilaSorb™ - Acoufelt Australia - Text formatting off , not all colors listed, buttons are incorrect, icons are old/incorrect.

BarrierBack™ - Acoufelt Australia - Remove full stop. Add TM's to all BarrierBack references, list key features.

QuietPrint - Acoufelt Australia - Can we change image. Add TM's to all references. Designs listed are wrong. Can we add image of brochure to this page. Check icons.

PRODUCT CATEGORIES:

Carpet Tiles - Acoufelt Australia - displaying incorrect collections. Remove full stop in title. Change heading to 'Carpet tile collections'

Wall - Acoufelt Australia - change to 'Wall collections', Furniture - Acoufelt Australia - change to 'Furniture collections' (same for each category page)

PROJECTS:

Projects - Acoufelt Australia - Change title to 'Our projects'

Check functionality of filter. Change to I'm look for 'Any application'.

CSR

Corporate Social Responsibility - Acoufelt Australia

Remove full stop in title.

Each of these link (see https://acoufelt.com/au/corporate-social-responsibility/)

Change this sentence instead to a button (with space) that links to our culture page [OUR CULTURE]

SUSTAINABILITY:

Remove this floating sentence and tighten - not required.

FAQ:

Missing.

Merchandise:

Merchandise - Acoufelt Australia

Update header image (pixelated). We will supply new image.

Update quality of images - these look pixelated. I will supply new images.

Button squished.

FORMS:

Check 'request a quote' function and 'request a sample' function. Let's also have a from for the 'Talk to us' under the Custom section on each product page. Will send fields in separate email. We'll also have a brainstorm on how we'll manage and display the sampling on some of these collections and come back to you.

404 ERROR PAGE:

Copy from current 404.

OTHER RECENT ADDITIONS:

Add 'pinnable' feature on FilaSorb page (copy from current site)

LRV PDF on FilaSorb page (https://acoufelt.com/au/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2021/12/Acoufelt_Light-Reflectance-Values.pdf) (copy from current site)

Fracture panel spec sheet: use https://acoufelt.com/au/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2021/12/Fracture-Panels_Spec-Sheet_FA.pdf

Sustainability page - addition of LFI copy and image : https://acoufelt.com/au/sustainability/ (copy from current site)

That should be it from me for now! (also sorry if any already addressed in Karina or Keenan's feedback)


Thanks!

Lucy Pittman

Marketing Manager

T +61 1800 626 462 • M +61 414 167 790

Australia Square - Suite 2, Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney NSW 2000

acoufelt.com

Acoufelt's Australian offices will close on 5pm Thursday 23rd December,
and reopen 8am Tuesday 4th January 2022.

-

Last orders will need to be placed for dispatch before
Christmas Eve by (General Service cut-off dates)*

• Thursday 16th Dec (Dispatch to Perth)
• Monday 20th Dec (Dispatch to Sydney, Brisbane, Adelaide, Melbourne)
• Wednesday 22nd Dec (For next day delivery express services)

*QuickShip products only
